data.what_is: The ultimate CRM system to optimize & grow your business with email marketing and marketing automation, which are easy to learn & generate high return on investment. Elite Campaign provides effective automation of business & marketing processes, along with support & training. Key features include multiple email types, email segmentation, dynamic content, managed deliverability, mobile optmized, forms, split testing, marketing automation & CRM.
data.product_description: Grow your online business with email marketing and marketing automation, which are easy to learn & generates high return on investment.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Elite Campaign?
It's very powerful email marketing application. We are able to schedule many messages to be sent on later date. Personalizing of emails is well designed and its very simple to intergrate with other applications.

What do you dislike about Elite Campaign?
It's has been running very effectively.No dislike at all.

Recommendations to others considering Elite Campaign:
Very cost effective when using this application. Customer service is great and available any time.simple to install and implement.

What problems is Elite Campaign solving and how is that benefiting you?
Elite campaign has enables us to personalize customer email using name.Its aslo simple to intergrate with other applications. The application is very cost effective.

initial_reviews.review_title: Outstanding and Stable Email Marketing Application.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Elite Campaign?
Elite Campaign is very powerful and reliable platform. Integration with our saleforce CRM applicaition was very fast to implement.When blasting email removing duplicates has been so easy using this applicaition.

What do you dislike about Elite Campaign?
Elite Campaign is the most stable email marketing applicaition i have used. No dislike

Recommendations to others considering Elite Campaign:
Elite Campaign is superb and comprehensive applicaition to have.No downtime and it's very cost effective. Customer support is outstanding.

What problems is Elite Campaign solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer service is outstanding and very responsive to any issue you raise any time. Elite Campaign pricing is very competitive .We have not experienced any downtime when using this application,it's superb.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Elite Campaign?
I really enjoy the simplicity of the software and the fact that it is filled with features to keep track of contacts and what they have done. Definitely recommend

What do you dislike about Elite Campaign?
New to the software so still learning what it has to offer

Recommendations to others considering Elite Campaign:
Definitely consider if you are looking for easy to use software but filled with value added features.

What problems is Elite Campaign solving and how is that benefiting you?
Haven't need the software to solve a problem but I am realizing the different uses that it has to offer.
